cafe: Woolshed Coffee Co (850b Adelaide St W) - You guys will be going to Woolshed Coffee Co and then enjoy local art, craft beer, and relax in the park by checking out: Liberty Village Art Walk, The Craft Brasserie & Grille, Trinity Bellwoods Park.
